pullrequest.title: Implement virtual evidence for all segway tasks

content.raw: I’ve updated this to use EPSILON, matching yours. Beyond this change I believe the other bug changes, fixing the way we sum dict values in python 3 and the issue with coordinates with multiple priors were fixed when we made the change to only allow one label per line in the BED3 file. \(The change in how the presence\_array was used was already implemented\)
content.html: I’ve updated this to use EPSILON, matching yours. Beyond this change I believe the other bug changes, fixing the way we sum dict values in python 3 and the issue with coordinates with multiple priors were fixed when we made the change to only allow one label per line in the BED3 file. (The change in how the presence_array was used was already implemented)
